sourcesContent:
{{tweet.username}}

{{tweet.createdAt | date: 'short'}}

{{tweet.content}}

import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Tweet} from "../Interfaces/Tweet"; import {ImagesService} from "../services/images.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-tweet-display', templateUrl: './tweet-display.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tweet-display.component.css'] }) export class TweetDisplayComponent implements OnInit { @Input() tweets: Tweet[] | undefined; constructor(private imagesService: ImagesService) {} ngOnInit() {} getProfilePhotoUrl(username: string) { return this.imagesService.getProfilePhotoUrl(username); } }
